content:
Canurta is laying a solid foundation to support its mission of creating novel botanical therapeutics with rare polyphenols by setting up operations within a cutting-edge, 34-acre agri-commercial lot in the Niagara Region. We are in the process of constructing a 7,800 square foot agri-processing building, designed according to the National Farm Building Code and GMP specifications, with potential for future expansion. This state-of-the-art facility will be fully equipped with all necessary infrastructures, streamlining production and ensuring adherence to stringent standards throughout the manufacturing, development, and delivery processes.

By establishing itself in this innovative farming environment, Canurta aims to become a leader in the field and bring its technology to other locations, contributing to local development and advancing the global pursuit of novel botanical therapeutics.
